text.0: he lighting up the flame shall conquer enemies strong shall he be who offers prayer and brings his gift.
text.1: he with his seed spreads forth beyond anothers seed whomever brahmaṇaspati takes for his friend.
text.2: with heroes he shall overcome his hero foes and spread his wealth by kine wise by himself is be.
text.3: his children and his childrens children grow in strength whomever brahmaṇaspati takes for his friend.
text.4: he mighty like a raving rivers billowy flood as a bull conquers oxen overcomes with strength.
text.5: like agnis blazing rush he may not be restrained whomever brahmaṇaspati takes for his friend.
text.6: for him the floods of heaven flow never failing down first with the heroes he goes forth to war for kine.
text.7: he slays in unabated vigour with great might whomever brahmaṇaspati takes for his friend.
text.8: all roaring rivers pour their waters down for him and many a flawless shelter hath been granted him.
text.9: blest with the happiness of gods he prospers well whomever brahmaṇaspati takes for his friend.
